ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am not sure if you can do that or not, how I maxxed out my sneak though was I just hit sneak untill it succeeded (after the first point in it) and didn t
ygData.messageBody:
I am not sure if you can do that or not, how I maxxed out my sneak though
was I just hit sneak untill it succeeded (after the first point in it) and
didn't unsneak untill it was maxxed (or I needed to run like hell). SO I
guess that would work. Of course like most things that are around the rules
are usually bad and can get you in trouble.


>From: <ug@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
>To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
>Date: Fri, 28 Apr 2000 08:24:48 -0500 (EST)
>
>Currey, Mick writes:
>
> > BTW, I love my new Iksar monk!
>
>I've read the sneak thing too; never tried it.
>
>Question though:
>
>When you get your sneak skill and train 1 point in to it, can you hit
>sneak, walk up to a wall, hit autorun and go eat dinner and just have
>it raise on its own? Or is the skill check made only when you hit the
>button?
